institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 17 (Basic Principles for Appeals)
contents: Article 17 (Basic principles for objections) ① Objections are limited to matters that occurred during the competition period, such as the game execution process and evaluation and scoring results. ② Objections must be submitted in writing in principle. ③ Objections may be submitted in writing. When doing so, the personal identity or reputation of technical committee members must be protected from infringement, and the independence of evaluation and scoring must be guaranteed.
